snippet: Andy Murray has already scaled the tennis summit but Japan's Kei Nishikori did his best to loosen his footing before falling in a three-hour thriller at the ATP World Tour Finals on Wednesday....
lead_paragraph: Andy Murray has already scaled the tennis summit but Japan's Kei Nishikori did his best to loosen his footing before falling in a three-hour thriller at the ATP World Tour Finals on Wednesday.

headline.print_headline: Murray Wobbles but Hangs On to Beat Nishikori in Thriller
headline.main: Murray Wobbles but Hangs On to Beat Nishikori in Thriller
